primary.title: CPTS Certification
primary.description: Pursuing HTB's Certified Penetration Testing Specialist certification

secondary.title: Hands-On Practice
secondary.description: Engaging with Active and Retired machines to learn and apply skills

journey.title: CPTS Certification Journey
journey.description: Hands-on certification that assesses the candidates' penetration testing skills

timeline.title: Foundation Building
timeline.description: Completed fundamental modules covering networking, web applications, and basic exploitation techniques.

timeline.title: Skill Development
timeline.description: Advanced through complex topics including Active Directory, privilege escalation, and post-exploitation.

timeline.title: Certification Preparation
timeline.description: Currently completing final modules and preparing for the hands-on CPTS examination.

timeline.title: Professional Application
timeline.description: Goal: Apply certified skills in real-world pentesting scenarios and pursue OSCP certification.
